body:
We see these in the logs:

```
java.lang.Throwable: Process hasn't generated any output for a long time.
If it's a long-running mostly idle daemon process, consider overriding OSProcessHandler#readerOptions with 'BaseOutputReader.Options.forMostlySilentProcess()' to reduce CPU usage.
Command line: /usr/lib/.../bin/pub global run devtools --machine --port=0
	com.intellij.execution.process.BaseOSProcessHandler.<init>(), BaseOSProcessHandler.java:33
	com.intellij.execution.process.OSProcessHandler.<init>(), OSProcessHandler.java:89
	com.intellij.execution.process.OSProcessHandler.<init>(), OSProcessHandler.java:44
	io.flutter.sdk.FlutterCommand.startProcess(), FlutterCommand.java:201
	io.flutter.sdk.FlutterCommand.startProcessOrShowError(), FlutterCommand.java:230
	io.flutter.sdk.FlutterCommand.startInConsole(), FlutterCommand.java:119
	io.flutter.devtools.DevToolsInstance.startServer(), DevToolsManager.java:167
	io.flutter.devtools.DevToolsManager.openBrowserImpl(), DevToolsManager.java:137
	io.flutter.devtools.DevToolsManager.openBrowserAndConnect(), DevToolsManager.java:122
	io.flutter.devtools.DevToolsManager.openBrowserAndConnect(), DevToolsManager.java:118
	io.flutter.run.OpenDevToolsAction.lambda$actionPerformed$1(), OpenDevToolsAction.java:76
	java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.uniAccept(), CompletableFuture.java:656
	java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture$UniAccept.tryFire(), CompletableFuture.java:632
	java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.postComplete(), CompletableFuture.java:474
	java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture.complete(), CompletableFuture.java:1962
	io.flutter.devtools.DevToolsManager$1.run(), DevToolsManager.java:88
```

```
java.lang.Throwable: Process hasn't generated any output for a long time.
If it's a long-running mostly idle daemon process, consider overriding OSProcessHandler#readerOptions with 'BaseOutputReader.Options.forMostlySilentProcess()' to reduce CPU usage.
Command line: /usr/local/.../Android/Sdk/emulator/emulator -avd Pixel_2_API_26
	com.intellij.execution.process.BaseOSProcessHandler.<init>(), BaseOSProcessHandler.java:33
	com.intellij.execution.process.OSProcessHandler.<init>(), OSProcessHandler.java:89
	com.intellij.execution.process.OSProcessHandler.<init>(), OSProcessHandler.java:44
	io.flutter.android.AndroidEmulator.startEmulator(), AndroidEmulator.java:54
	io.flutter.actions.OpenEmulatorAction.actionPerformed(), OpenEmulatorAction.java:44
	com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.ex.ActionUtil$1.run(), ActionUtil.java:261
	com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.ex.ActionUtil.performActionDumbAware(), ActionUtil.java:278
	com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.ex.ActionUtil.performActionDumbAwareWithCallbacks(), ActionUtil.java:252
	com.intellij.ui.popup.ActionPopupStep.performAction(), ActionPopupStep.java:200
	com.intellij.ui.popup.ActionPopupStep.performAction(), ActionPopupStep.java:190
	com.intellij.ui.popup.ActionPopupStep.lambda$onChosen$2(), ActionPopupStep.java:184
	com.intellij.openapi.application.TransactionGuardImpl.performUserActivity(), TransactionGuardImpl.java:195
```

```java.lang.Throwable: Process hasn't generated any output for a long time.
If it's a long-running mostly idle daemon process, consider overriding OSProcessHandler#readerOptions with 'BaseOutputReader.Options.forMostlySilentProcess()' to reduce CPU usage.
Command line: /.../mobile/flutter/tools/ide/flutter_test.sh --no-color --machine code_under_test.dart -- --enable-debugging
	com.intellij.execution.process.BaseOSProcessHandler.<init>(), BaseOSProcessHandler.java:33
	com.intellij.execution.process.OSProcessHandler.<init>(), OSProcessHandler.java:89
	com.intellij.execution.process.OSProcessHandler.<init>(), OSProcessHandler.java:44
	io.flutter.run.bazelTest.BazelTestFields.run(), BazelTestFields.java:176
	io.flutter.run.bazelTest.BazelTestLaunchState.startProcess(), BazelTestLaunchState.java:62
	com.intellij.execution.configurations.CommandLineState.execute(), CommandLineState.java:61
	io.flutter.run.bazelTest.BazelTestRunner.runInDebugger(), BazelTestRunner.java:79
	io.flutter.run.bazelTest.BazelTestRunner.doExecute(), BazelTestRunner.java:73
	com.intellij.execution.runners.GenericProgramRunner$execute$$inlined$runProfileStarter$1.executeAsync(), GenericProgramRunner.kt:56
	com.intellij.execution.runners.GenericProgramRunnerKt$startRunProfile$$inlined$runProfileStarter$1.executeAsync(), GenericProgramRunner.kt:56
	com.intellij.execution.impl.ExecutionManagerKtImpl$startRunProfile$startRunnable$1.run(), ExecutionManagerKtImpl.kt:63
```
title: warnings about 'mostly idle daemon process'
